name: New Message (angelawrites)
description:
You receive a text from your friend. How do you respond?

New Message is a really short game made in 48 hour for the Area of Effect with the theme 'Message Received'. Click on different parts of Cassie's text to unlock different responses to reach one of the 8 different endings. 

This was my first time using Visual Novel Maker and my first time making a video game so, while I believe I got most of the bugs worked out, please let me know if you find any!

~~~~
